long_description: The Lookin Athletic bike saddle offers the cushioning comfort of gel with a supportive shape that's great for riding in a slightly bent forward position. RoyalGel adapts to your anatomy, reduces pressure points and helps absorb vibration and shock for comfort; gel does not age, harden, or migrate over time. Saddle cover is designed to stay cool in the sun, helping prevent your backside from getting scorched when you remount after an off-bike stroll or errand. Lookin Athletic saddle shape is designed to offer support and comfort for those riding in a slightly bent forward riding position. Integrated clip system (ICS) allows for hassle-free attachment of a compatible saddle bag (not included).
short_description: The Lookin Athletic bike saddle offers the cushioning comfort of gel with a supportive shape that's great for riding in a slightly bent forward position.
